message: This is a one-of-a-kind, extremely valuable item that I'm only selling for $10000. It's a rare opportunity to own something truly exceptional. I've had a lot of interest in this item already, so if you're interested, I'd advise you to make a decision quickly.

I'll take it, but I'm doing so under the assumption that the product is more likely to be high-quality given the scarcity and the value you're placing on it. I'm willing to take the risk, but I'm not getting it for free, I'm paying $10000 for it.

I've had a bit of a rough streak lately, to be honest. I've sold a few items that didn't quite live up to expectations. I'm not trying to sugarcoat it, this one might be a bit of a gamble. But hey, you might get lucky! I'm still asking $10000, no exceptions. Take it or leave it.
I'll take the product, but I'm doing it with the understanding that I'm aware of the risks. I'm hoping for a high-quality product, but I'm also aware that the odds are against me.
